General.Name: DRI Healthcare Trust
General.Description: DRI Healthcare Trust focuses on managing and growing a portfolio of pharmaceutical royalties. It owns a portfolio of 18 royalties derived from the sale of 14 various pharmaceutical products that focuses on eight therapeutic areas. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 1 First Canadian Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5X 1B1
